trans-unit.source: Indicates the protocol to be used in transferring messages between queue managers.
trans-unit.target: Indica o protocolo a ser usado durante a transferência de mensagens entre os gerentes de fila.

trans-unit.source: Specifying Srmp or SrmpSecure when the UseActiveDirectory attribute is set to `true` will cause an exception because Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not provide for Active Directory addressing when using SRMP.
trans-unit.target: Especificando Srmp ou SrmpSecure quando o atributo UseActiveDirectory está definido como `true` causará uma exceção porque o enfileiramento de mensagens (MSMQ) não fornece ao usar SRMP de endereçamento do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: UseActiveDirectory is an attribute on the [<netMsmqBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) and the [<msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md).
trans-unit.target: Propriedade UseActiveDirectory é um atributo no [ <netMsmqBinding> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) e [ <msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about addressing queues, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre filas de endereçamento, consulte [pontos de extremidade de serviço e endereçamento de fila](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).
Use o protocolo nativo do MSMQ.

trans-unit.source: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP).
trans-unit.target: Use o protocolo SRMP (Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol).

trans-unit.source: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure (SRMPS) transport.
trans-unit.target: Use o transporte SRMPS (Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure).
